short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-Category Refresh | Auto Selects AI & Illustrations | Auto Submit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto-Refresh Category: The system automatically updates the category list, ensuring that the latest categories are available without manual intervention.
Auto-Selects AI & Illustrations: Upon refreshing, the system auto-selects the "AI" and "Illustrations" categories, so users donâ€™t need to select them manually.
Auto-Check Checkbox: Once the desired categories are selected, the system automatically ticks the relevant checkboxes as specified.
Auto-Selects Cat Image: If there is an option for an image related to a cat, the system will automatically select this image.
Auto-Fill Description: If there is a pre-defined description, the system will automatically input this into the description field.
Auto Submit: After completing all necessary steps, the system will automatically press the "Submit" button.
